email in async mode.</p> <p> <b>Inputs:</b> </p> <ul> <li> <strong>Task Id</strong> - Associated Localization Task sys_id. </li> <li> <strong>Action</strong> - currently supported actions are machine_translate, send_via_email, send_to_tms and retrieve_translations. </li> <li> <strong>Mode</strong> - currently supported modes are auto and manual. </li> <li> <strong>Additional Info</strong> - It is a JSON with additional details specific to translator. </li> </ul> <p> <b>Outputs:</b> </p> <ul> <li> <strong>Status</strong> - 'Success' if the request succeeds or 'Error' if a failure occurs. </li> <li> <strong>message</strong> - outcome of the action. </li> </ul> <p></description> <internal_name>translate_requested_items</internal_name>
